Busters

Introduction

Takara is a Japanese rapper under Marbling E&M. She is a former member of the girl group Busters. She is also a member of the upcoming project group MyBling.

She joined the group on March 16, 2020 alongside Minji. She officially debuted with the group on May 13 with the single album 'Paeonia'.
